thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Folkestone Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, comfy beds!
thread.title_full: Great location, comfy beds! - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Folkestone Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cellcat
title: Great location, comfy beds!
text:
Visited Paris for 3 night with my Mum. We had a twin room on the 5th floor.
Comfy beds and decent shower room with bath too. The room backed out onto a market place, so it was very noisy on Saturday morning!
The staff were really friendly and helpful.
The hotel was in a great location - we walked everywhere! About 35/40 mins to Eiffel Tower etc.
Room Tip: try and ask for a room not facing the market! See more room tips
